resources.string: Introduzir o nome de utilizador da Conta Xiaomi

O nome não pode exceder 20 caracteres
O nome tem de ter no mínimo 2 caracteres

Detectámos um erro na sua palavra-passe do ecrã de bloqueio. Pode submeter os registos do dispositivo e ajudar-nos a localizar e resolver o problema. O registo apenas vai ser utilizado para resolver o problema e eliminado quando o problema estiver resolvido
Está a guardar registos de software no seu dispositivo. Podem conter informações pessoais e dados de localização
Limite de caracteres excedido em %1$d de %2$d
O número de telefone %1$s está associado à Conta Xiaomi %2$s. Não vai ser necessário associar novamente à Conta Xiaomi %3$s se continuar. Continuar?

Iniciar sessão na sua Conta Xiaomi para os nossos serviços técnicos entrarem em contacto consigo. Pode ver o estado dos seus relatórios em \"Os meus relatórios\"

O número de telefone associado ao número da conta atingiu o máximo(3). Não pode associar mais contas

Iremos utilizar este email para verificar a sua conta
É esta a sua Conta Xiaomi?
A submeter comentários, a gerar registos, a ver FAQs

Todas as funcionalidades de comentários foram movidos para a nova aplicação \"Serviços e comentários\". A aplicação Comentários vai ser removido do seu ecrã inicial. Toque \"Abrir\" para experimentar \"Serviços e comentários\"
Não foi possível carregar os itens
Utilizar dados móveis para carregar registos pode gerar custos adicionais
Carregar registos utilizando dados móveis necessita de %sMB
Testing your network will help you detect problems and improve your connection.
To test network, turn off mobile data first.
To test network, connect to Wi-Fi and disconnect from other networks first.
To test network, connect to Wi-Fi and disconnect from other networks first.
To test network, connect to Wi-Fi first.
To test network, connect to Wi-Fi first.

(Users outside China should enter the mobile phone number in the following format: +[area code][phone number], e.g.: +91 817282982)
A palavra-passe deve ter 8 a 16 letras e incluir números e letras (maiúsculas e minúsculas)
Foram associadas demasiadas contas com este número, tente um diferente

O seu comentário assim como os relatórios de erros vão ser enviados para os servidores MIUI. Podem conter informações pessoais e dados de localização
Não foi possível publicar no fórum MIUI

Este serviço necessita de permissões para funcionar normalmente. As suas informações pessoais ficam protegidas de acordo com as leis em vigor e com a nossa Política de Privacidade:

Aceder à câmara: experimente a gravação em tempo real para configurar o Avatar

Se não concordar em dar esta autorização ou com o envio dos seus dados pessoais, não vai poder utilizar esta funcionalidade, mas não vai afectar a utilização normal desta aplicação. Pode desligar o aviso de permissão nas Definições ou retirar o seu consentimento
Solicitou muitos emails de verificação. Certifique-se que o email de verificação não está na pasta Spam do seu email
Pode levar algum tempo a receber a mensagem. Começar de novo mesmo assim?
A nova palavra-passe tem de ser diferente da antiga
Iniciar sessão com a sua Conta Xiaomi
A sessão expirou. Inicie sessão novamente para se ligar a esta conta
Demasiadas tentativas. Tente outro método de iniciar sessão
Parece que os registos estão a ser gerados agora. Interromper e enviar aqueles que estão prontos?
O seu comentário, os anexos e os registos vão ser enviados para os servidores Mi. Se ocorrer algum erro de rede enquanto estiver a enviar, vai-lhe ser pedido que tente novamente
O seu comentário, os anexos e os registos vão ser enviados para os servidores Mi. Se ocorrer algum erro de rede enquanto estiver a enviar, vai-lhe ser pedido que tente novamente

Add original image or short video
"If the issue you're reporting is related to camera's image quality, add an original sample photo (uncropped) to help us locate the issue. Add photo now?"
"This might affect the overall performance of your device. If you can't reproduce the issue you want to report, go back to logs and tap \"Cancel\"."
"1. Go back to the feature you want to report and reproduce it. 2. Come back to this page and tap \"Finish and upload\"."
"%1$d. Tap \"Start\" to start generating logs. %2$d. Reproduce the issue you've encountered. %3$d. Come back to this page and tap \"Finish and upload\"."
Audio, call sound, and audio recording
Tap to go back to logs

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain the information about the audio on your device, including playback history and recording history. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain Bluetooth device usage info (including call history, messages, transferred files etc.). Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain Camera usage info (including CPU frequency, system call, memory usage etc.). Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain charging stats. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your personal info and location info. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain the information collected by your device's sensors (including ambient light sensor, barometer, pedometer, magnetometer, etc.). Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your messages, call history, network info, and communication data. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain app usage stats (including CPU frequency, system call, memory usage, etc.). Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your personal info, location info, as well as the IP and MAC addresses of your device. If you're connected to an unencrypted Wi-Fi network, we might also be able to access parts of your communication data. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your personal info, location info, as well as the IP and MAC addresses of your device. If you're connected to an unencrypted Wi-Fi network, we might also be able to access parts of your communication data. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."
"Couldn't get FAQ info, check network connection"
The text you entered is too long
"Logs will help us locate and fix the issue you're about to report much faster. Generate logs and attach them to your feedback."
For accessing Mi Account info in order to identify device

"In order to improve the services provided to you, we'll upload usage stats and system logs to our servers. These items may include your personal information, as well as the information about your device and networks. We'll use uploaded items to locate and analyze the problems in the system."
For accessing device model, IMEI, and device ID in order to locate and solve issues
For accessing storage and saving items including logs, images, and videos
No network connection, tap here to go to Settings

string.name: submit_dialog_content_global_with_contactinfo
string.Data: "Your feedback, along with attachments (if any), logs (you can uncheck the corresponding boxes for the items you don't want to upload), phone number or email will be sent to MIUI's servers. Logs may contain personal info and your location data. Selecting \"Agree\" means that you've read and agreed to our Privacy Policy and User Agreement."

resources.string: System is busy. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"This file format isn't supported. Try selecting a different file."
You can update to the version %1$s now.

resources.string: "You won't be able to keep using our services unless you agree to the new version of our %s. Agree to the updated Privacy Policy now?"
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of %1$s. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As %2$s provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept %3$s services. Withdraw consent now?"
